title.en: A1-07 — Simple Present: I Go / He Goes
title.vi: A1-07 — Hiện Tại Đơn: I Go / He Goes

content.en: This room teaches you the basic Simple Present tense for daily actions. You will learn the difference between I go and He goes. This is an important step for speaking correctly. Keep sentences short and steady. Clear ending sounds help listeners understand you easily.
content.vi: Phòng này dạy bạn thì Hiện Tại Đơn cho các hành động hằng ngày. Bạn sẽ hiểu sự khác nhau giữa I go và He goes. Đây là bước quan trọng để nói đúng ngữ pháp. Hãy dùng câu ngắn và đọc đều. Giữ âm cuối rõ ràng sẽ giúp người nghe hiểu bạn dễ hơn.

copy.en:
Practice these lines.
I go to work.
I go to school.
I go home.
You go now.
You go first.
Say each line slowly.
Short is correct.
copy.vi: Luyện các câu sau: I go to work, I go to school, I go home, You go now, You go first. Đọc chậm. Câu ngắn là đúng.

copy.en:
Practice with third person.
He goes to work.
She goes to school.
He goes home.
She goes early.
The s sound is important.
Say goes slowly.
copy.vi: Luyện ngôi thứ ba: He goes to work, She goes to school, He goes home, She goes early. Âm s rất quan trọng. Hãy đọc goes thật chậm và rõ.

copy.en:
Practice these verbs.
I eat.
I read.
He reads.
She eats.
I walk.
He walks.
Listen for s with he or she.
Speak calmly.
copy.vi: Luyện các động từ sau: I eat, I read, He reads, She eats, I walk, He walks. Nghe kỹ âm s khi dùng he hoặc she. Nói bình tĩnh.

copy.en:
Practice these patterns.
I work in the morning.
He works at night.
I study English.
She studies at home.
Feel each ending sound.
Accuracy first.
copy.vi: Luyện các mẫu câu sau: I work in the morning, He works at night, I study English, She studies at home. Cảm nhận âm cuối. Độ chính xác là quan trọng nhất.

copy.en:
Read these simple lines.
I drive.
He drives.
I cook.
She cooks.
I clean.
He cleans.
Say everything slowly and clearly.
copy.vi: Hãy đọc các câu sau: I drive, He drives, I cook, She cooks, I clean, He cleans. Đọc chậm và rõ ràng.

copy.en:
Repeat this short drill.
I walk.
He walks.
I read.
She reads.
I study.
He studies.
Calm practice builds strong skill.
copy.vi: Luyện đoạn sau: I walk, He walks, I read, She reads, I study, He studies. Thực hành bình tĩnh tạo nên kỹ năng vững chắc.
